com.uci.oit.pts.site.repository

Interface TicketsDaoInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TicketsDao

    public interface TicketsDaoInterface
    Ticket Dao Interface is the contract specifying ticket persistence and manipulation operations.
    Author:
    najih

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addNote(TicketNote note)
      This method adds a note for a specific ticket (by ticket number) to the DB.
      boolean createTicket(Ticket ticket)
      This method creates a single ticket object, then store it in the DB.
      java.util.List<Ticket> findTicket(java.lang.String assigned)
      This method finds a ticket or a group of tickets and returns the result as a List.
      java.util.List<Ticket> getAllTickets()
      Gets a List of all tickets.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getTicket(int id)
      getTicket method brings one ticket by id from the DB.
      java.util.List<Ticket> getTicketsByStatus(java.lang.String status)
      This method get a group of tickets by status.
      boolean updateTicket(int id, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
      This method updates a ticket values in the DB.
